Uses of Class
heif.BoxHandler

  • Packages that use BoxHandler 
    Package Description
    common
    Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.
    heif
    Provides high-level classes for parsing and manipulating HEIF-based files.

    • Uses of BoxHandler in common

      Methods in common with parameters of type BoxHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void HeifPropertyInjector.injectProperties(BoxHandler handler, java.nio.file.Path input, java.nio.file.Path output)
      Injects 'imir', 'clap', and 'pasp' properties into the HEIF file.
      private void HeifPropertyInjector.updateIlocOffsets(BoxHandler handler, byte[] newData, int ipcoAt, int ipmaAt, int pLen, int aLen)
      Audits and updates the 'iloc' (Item Location) box to maintain data integrity.

    • Uses of BoxHandler in heif

      Methods in heif with parameters of type BoxHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void HeifParser.logDebugBoxHierarchy(BoxHandler handler)
      Logs the hierarchy of boxes at the debug level for diagnostic purposes.
      private static void HeifDatePatcher.processExifSegment(BoxHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter raf, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Iterates through the Exif TIFF structure and patches date tags.
      private static void HeifDatePatcher.processXmpSegment(BoxHandler handler, ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, java.time.ZonedDateTime zdt, boolean xmpDump)
      Overwrites XMP date-time strings directly within the HEIF file's media data.
